name: Tala 2
Lore: 'Equipped with sophisticated sensor suite to monitor Imperial activity during Rebel commando operations. Hyperdrive allows longrange reconnaissance.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot. May be carried like a vehicle. When your spy aboard, opponent''s spies and scouts are deploy +2 to related sites. Immune to attrition < 4 when Lieutenant Blount piloting.',
